nodes.text: Silver was a strategic metal valued by pirates. Its value averaged 150 to 200 credits per kilogram. It was sometimes used in promise rings.
The color of silver also referred to anything that was colored like the metal, such as the lightsabers wielded by much of the Horn family.
The metal was also found in smokers on Muunilinst.
The blood of Devaronians was based on silver.
